text: The 2017 BOSS GP season was the 23rd season of the BOSS GP series. The championship began on 21 April at Hockenheim and finished on 1 October at Imola. ==Teams and Drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! Team ! Chassis ! Engine ! No. ! Driver !
